title: How is the camera quality of Poco F1? - Quora

response.answer_text: I recently bought this mobile, The camera quality is good Indeed. Also, It does not disappoint you in low light conditions. Another important aspect is Video recording which is too good for this price, the Bitrate is around 42mbps. But Oppo and Vivo are lagging behind in the video recording quality. It does not matter how the specifications are, It is up to us how the potential of Camera in any mobile is utilized.
